cards.title: Card 1
cards.msg: Toggle display/edit mode by clicking on the pencil

cards.title: Card 2
cards.msg: Reverse the stack of cards by clicking on the cycle arrows

cards.title: Card 3
cards.msg: Rearrange cards by dragging the header bar

cards.title: Card 4
cards.msg: Add a card to the bottom/delete the bottom card by clicking on the plus/minus

cards.title: Card 5
cards.msg: Save the stack of cards by entering a filename and clicking the 'into' arrow

cards.title: Card 6
cards.msg: Open a saved file by choosing the radio button and clicking the 'out of' arrow

cards.title: Card 7
cards.msg: Move a card to the trash by entering edit mode and clicking the X in the upper right or by dragging it to the trash

cards.title: Card 8
cards.msg: Empty the trash by clicking the 'Trash' button

cards.title: Card 9
cards.msg: Delete all cards by clicking the X inside the trashcan
